name: Super World Adventures
description:
*NOW FREE for a LIMITED TIME!*
a WILD BOAR has STOLEN your LUNCH! now it's TIME to CATCH HIM!
RUN, JUMP, and THROW ACORNS! cross RIVERS, climb MOUNTAINS, and MORE!

► ► ► ► ►

a young lumberjack named ritchie was taking his lunch one day, when all of a sudden, a nasty wild boar popped out from behind a tree, and stole his lunchbox and axe! determined to recover his belongings, ritchie set out on a journey through the forest to find the swine thief.

little did he know what troubles he would find!

► ► ► ► ►

• classic PLATFORMER GAMEPLAY
• ingenious LEVEL DESIGN
• 'fantasy lite' ART STYLE

► ► ► ► ►

• 6 uniquely landscaped ENVIRONMENTS
• 36 action-packed LEVELS
• 12 challenging BOSSES
• 100+ hidden BONUS ITEMS
• game center LEADERBOARDS + ACHIEVEMENTS

► ► ► ► ►
